attribs.name: damage_resistances
attribs.current: cold; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapon

attribs.name: condition_immunities
attribs.current: Charmed, Frightened, paralyzed or poisoned exhaustion

attribs.name: repeating_action_-KJXnaznvVUxFsZtRCQs_content
attribs.current: If it scores a critical hit, it rolls another damage (x3) die instead of just two.

attribs.name: repeating_action_-KJXnxZHUzCvZ1vpFC-9_content
attribs.current: Creatures set on fire may not regain / real damage. And each round the creature takes 6d6 fire damage.

attribs.name: repeating_action_-KJXoxd0rwbDBNKBSvO-_content
attribs.current: The creature pulls his chain in close and throw s out an enormous ball of flesh and bone at a space within 120ft bringing all creatures restrained by it with the throw, all creatures within 20ft of the target location must make a save to avoid the attack. On a failed save, creatures caught are knocked prone and restrained by the Ball, in addition they take (8d6) Bludgeoning and (8d6) piercing damage.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KJXmOsBVEsMqt8CXACs_content
attribs.current: Have Advantage against saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KJXmWeyfZCedmI-5EYL_content
attribs.current: The creature's attacks count as magical weapons

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KJXmd-Di92X6gyW5yi4_content
attribs.current: At the start of each its turns, each creature within within 5ft of it takes 10 (3d6) fire damage, and flamable objects in the aura that aren't being worn or carried ignite. A creature that touched the flesh or hits it with a melee attack while within 5ft takes 10(3d6)

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KJXnRcyzEZGbU4QJu91_content
attribs.current: Takes two attacks, one scythed claw; and one stomp
